fields.name: event
fields.description: Returns an event according to requested id

args.name: id
args.description: Alphanumeric identifier for the event

fields.name: eventSearch
fields.description: Search events using keywords and a location.

args.name: after
args.description: The start pointer for search results. For pagination. Default is base64 of `0`.

args.name: dataConfiguration
args.description: String propagated to the data api to allow customizing the clients experience

args.name: filter
args.description: Filter to minimize the list of results

args.name: first
args.description: Number of results to get.

args.name: sort
args.description: Sorts results

fields.name: group
fields.description: Fetch a single group by its id

fields.name: groupByUrlname
fields.description: Fetch a single group by its urlname

fields.name: groupSearch
fields.description: Search groups using keywords and a location.

args.name: after
args.description: The start pointer for search results. For pagination. Default is ''.

args.name: dataConfiguration
args.description: String propagated to the data api to allow customizing the clients experience

args.name: filter
args.description: Filter to minimize the list of results

args.name: first
args.description: Number of results to get.

fields.name: proNetwork
fields.description: Query a Pro Network by either id or urlname

args.name: id
args.description: Pro Network Id

args.name: urlname
args.description: Pro Network Urlname

args.name: after
args.description: The start pointer for search results. Default is base64 of `0`.

args.name: dataConfiguration
args.description: String propagated to the data api to allow customizing the clients experience

args.name: filter
args.description: Filter to minimize the list of results

args.name: first
args.description: Number of results to get.

args.name: sort
args.description: Sorts results

args.name: after
args.description: The start pointer for search results. Default is base64 of `0`.

args.name: filter
args.description: Filter to minimize the list of results

args.name: first
args.description: Number of results to get.

args.name: ignoreNewGroups
args.description: do not show new groups

fields.name: suggestTopics
fields.description: Suggest topics given a search term

args.name: excludeMemberTopics
args.description: Indicate if topics the member already added to own topics should be omitted.

args.name: includeNewGroups
args.description: indicates whether a special 'New Groups' category should be included in the response.
